TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RefreshMode extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Defines how the method handles optimistic concurrency conflicts.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This enumeration applies to all <xref:System.Data.Linq.DataContext.Refresh%2A> overloads.
## Examples The following example overwrites current values with values from the database.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/cs/program.cs" id="Snippet1"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/vb/module1.vb" id="Snippet1":::
The following example shows how to swap the original value with the values retrieved from the database. No current value is modified.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/cs/program.cs" id="Snippet2"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/vb/module1.vb" id="Snippet2":::
The following example keeps the current values that have been changed, but updates the other values with database values.
:::code language="csharp" source="~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/cs/program.cs" id="Snippet3"::: :::code language="vb" source="~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/system.data.linq.refreshmode/vb/module1.vb" id="Snippet3":::

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode KeepChanges = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Forces the method to keep the current value that has been changed, but updates the other values with the database values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode KeepCurrentValues = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Forces the method to swap the original value with the values retrieved from the database. No current value is modified.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Data.Linq.RefreshMode OverwriteCurrentValues = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Forces the method to override all the current values with the values from the database.
